post:
Hello LET,

its been a while :)

I do this little post to share with you new offers just released

--------------------------------------------------------------------

**So you Start**

https://www.soyoustart.com/ie/

All servers are 250Mbps

- 30% off on (almost) all the website
- Rolling discount/ lifetime discount
- no setup fees if 6/12 m commitment
- 4 new servers in limited edition released, FR datacenter only

* **SYS-LE-1**
€28.99 ex. VAT

Intel  Xeon E3-1230v6
4c / 8t ( 3.5GHz )
16GB DDR4 2400 MHz
SoftRAID  2x4TB   SATA

* **SYS-LE-2**
€28.99 ex. VAT

Intel  Xeon E3-1230v6
4c / 8t ( 3.5GHz )
16GB DDR4 2400 MHz
SoftRAID  2x450GB   NVMe

* **SYS-LE-3**
€32.99 ex. VAT

Intel  Xeon E3-1230v6
4c / 8t ( 3.5GHz )
32GB DDR4 2400 MHz
SoftRAID  2x4TB   SATA

* **SYS-LE-4**
€32.99 ex. VAT

Intel  Xeon E3-1230v6
4c / 8t ( 3.5GHz )
32GB DDR4 2400 MHz
SoftRAID  2x450GB   NVMe

------------------------------------------------------------------------

**OVH**

SYS-1 /SYS-2 new servers in limited edition
Those SYS offers are included with our Rise OVH range.

- Multiple datacenters available
- 500 Mbps bandwidth
- For the first time, we don't display specific CPU but we guarantee a minimum level of performance: min core /thread + min frequency

Prices are above LET rules, it has lot of stockage so it could be interested for some of you so I won't describe them. I will only give you the link.

https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-ie/lp/baremetal-flashsale/

Don't hesitate to give your feedback on it.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I wish you all a nice summer time !

ninzo
